body:
Archive client sendArchiveSignal: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/service/worker/archiver/client.go#L279
signalTimeout is hard-coded to 300ms: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/service/worker/archiver/client.go#L114

Users run into issues with it being too short and have to increase it and rebuild from source, see for example: https://community.temporal.io/t/archival-100-failure-of-signal-archives/4280

Please increase this default timeout and also make it configurable (dynamicconfig?)
title: Increase default sendArchiveSignal timeout and make it configurable
